refnamediv.refpurpose: Base font class for Fontconfig-based backends

refsynopsisdiv.title: Synopsis

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: PangoFcFont is a base class for font implementation using the Fontconfig and FreeType libraries. It is used in the Xft and FreeType backends shipped with Pango, but can also be used when creating new backends. Any backend deriving from this base class will take advantage of the wide range of shapers implemented using FreeType that come with Pango.

refsect2.title: PangoFcFont
refsect2.para: PangoFcFont is a base class for font implementations using the Fontconfig and FreeType libraries and is used in conjunction with PangoFcFontMap. When deriving from this class, you need to implement all of its virtual functions other than shutdown() along with the get_glyph_extents() virtual function from PangoFont.

refsect2.title: PANGO_RENDER_TYPE_FC
refsect2.para: A string constant used to identify shape engines that work with the fontconfig based backends. See the engine_type field of PangoEngineInfo.

refsect2.title: pango_fc_font_lock_face ()
refsect2.para: Gets the FreeType FT_Face associated with a font, This face will be kept around until you call pango_fc_font_unlock_face().

listitem.simpara: a PangoFcFont.
the FreeType FT_Face associated with font.

refsect2.title: pango_fc_font_unlock_face ()
refsect2.para: Releases a font previously obtained with pango_fc_font_lock_face().

listitem.simpara: a PangoFcFont.

refsect2.title: pango_fc_font_has_char ()
refsect2.para: Determines whether font has a glyph for the codepoint wc.

listitem.simpara: a PangoFcFont
Unicode codepoint to look up
TRUE if font has the requested codepoint.

refsect2.title: pango_fc_font_get_glyph ()
refsect2.para: Gets the glyph index for a given Unicode character for font. If you only want to determine whether the font has the glyph, use pango_fc_font_has_char().

listitem.simpara: a PangoFcFont
Unicode character to look up
the glyph index, or 0, if the Unicode character doesn't exist in the font.

refsect2.title: pango_fc_font_get_unknown_glyph ()

warning.para: pango_fc_font_get_unknown_glyph is deprecated and should not be used in newly-written code.

refsect2.para: Returns the index of a glyph suitable for drawing wc as an unknown character.

listitem.simpara: a PangoFcFont
the Unicode character for which a glyph is needed.
a glyph index into font.

refsect2.title: pango_fc_font_kern_glyphs ()
refsect2.para: Adjust each adjacent pair of glyphs in glyphs according to kerning information in font.

listitem.simpara: a PangoFcFont
a PangoGlyphString

refsect2.title: The "pattern" property
refsect2.para: The fontconfig pattern for this font.
